Online Exam

import { Component, ViewChild } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css', ] }) export class HomeComponent { title = 'app'; showRegister: boolean = false; @ViewChild('') register: any; Register() { console.log('Register'); this.showRegister = true; } }
